creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
description: a scholar sits gazing into the distance on a rocky promontory amidst towering trees, dwarfed by a large cliff which extends vertically up the right side
markings: \'Copied by Baiitsu Ryo\', in ink, at ULC; \'Lan Ying chih yin (Painted), T\'ien-shu fu (painted), Baiitsu rojin, Rinbon\', seals, at ULC
medium: Ink and colors on satin; hanging scroll
title: Autumn Contentment
